review.title: An Innovative Approach for online Meta Search Engine Optimization
review.abstract: This paper presents an approach to identify efficient techniques used in Web Search Engine Optimization (SEO). Understanding SEO factors which can influence page ranking in search engine is significant for webmasters who wish to attract large number of users to their website. Different from previous relevant research, in this study we developed an intelligent Meta search engine which aggregates results from various search engines and ranks them based on several important SEO parameters. The research tries to establish that using more SEO parameters in ranking algorithms helps in retrieving better search results thus increasing user satisfaction. Initial results generated from Meta search engine outperformed existing search engines in terms of better retrieved search results with high precision.
histories: The 6th Conference on Software, Knowledge, Information Management and Applications, Chengdu, China, September 9-11 2012, #57

sections.heading: IV. LIMITATIONS
sections.text: There are many factors that influence a website's ranking, and these factors are kept secret by search engines in order to keep their ranking algorithms safe. General SEO techniques have been used for experiments, but it has been difficult to draw general conclusions from the results retrieved due to the limitations of the queries used and the use of people. (3) Only white hat techniques are appliced.3

sections.heading: V. CONCLUSION
sections.text: The iral ranking algorithm uses search engine optimization factors to assign heuristic page ranks to search engine results pages and display them to users. Experimental results have shown that the iral meta search engine has overtaken the search engines Google (0.44) and Bing (0.31) with an average accuracy of 0.48. Initial results were promising and the results showed that the iral meta search algorithm is useful for effectively categorizing web data and generating a ranking based on these parameters that can achieve more beneficial results for the user query, thereby increasing user satisfaction. The iral meta search algorithm has proven to be effective and efficient for keywords. The iral meta search engine is online for users and there is an interesting way to extend its lifespan. the system will improve over time and interactive feedbacks of users will help with future changes. The iral meta search engine is more useful for users if certain search results are observed to a high degree of algorithm interest.

metadata.abstractText: This paper presents an approach to identify efficient techniques used in Web Search Engine Optimization (SEO). Understanding SEO factors which can influence page’s ranking in search engine is significant for webmasters who wish to attract large number of users to their website. Different from previous relevant research, in this study we developed an intelligent Meta search engine which aggregates results from various search engines and ranks them based on several important SEO parameters. The research tries to establish that using more SEO parameters in ranking algorithms helps in retrieving better search results thus increasing user satisfaction. Initial results generated from Meta search engine outperformed existing search engines in terms of better retrieved search results with high precision.
